title: FS: T205 lot (raw & SGC) - 17 cards w/ SP - SOLD!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: T205 lot (raw & SGC) - 17 cards w/ SP - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Looking to get $300 for this T205 lot.  I need to unload it, unfortunately, but I haven't been too serious about it since my e98 project has really taken off and my T206s as well.

Here's what I have:

Barry - Honest Long Cut - fair w/ creases and rounded corners, but nicely centered
Birmingham - Sweet Cap Black - fair with multiple creases
Doyle - Piedmont - trimmed at top, otherwise nice card
Elberfeld - Piedmont - VG except for small pencil writing on back
Foxen - Piedmont - poor w/ multiple creases, rounded corners, and bottom middle border missing
Lord, Bris - Hassan - poor w/ tac hole at bottom and tac hole gone bad at top!  :) Otherwise a nice card.
Lord, Harry - Honest Long Cut - minor trimming at top, minor corner crease and a couple rounded corners.  presents very well
McElveen - Sweet Cap Black - SGC 30
Merkle - Piedmont - poor - part of border ripped off at top
Milan - Honest Long Cut - poor/fair - multiple creases and rounded corners and stamped H on back
Miller - Honest Long Cut - good w/ worn corners and small surface crease
Payne - Hassan - poor because of two tac hole incidents, but otherwise a very presentable card
Rowan SP - Piedmont - poor/fair - couple of tac holes on front that do not impede with the picture and perhaps green added to the top right corner.  nice looking card otherwise
Schaefer - Hassan - fair/good - rounded corners and one solid crease
Stone - Sweet Cap Red - good o/c with part of another card showing on back
Thomas - Polar Bear - good....but great looking card!
Wolter - Piedmont - SGC 10

Jimi

ok, put your boxing gloves on :)
email sent

The cards are still available.  
Jimi brought a heavier set of boxing gloves than I did and put me on the canvas.  :)
Three Senators in this lot?  Not quite following your posts - what is still available?
The entire lot is sold now.  Sorry for the confusion.
